name: Crochet Bow Scarf for Toddler-Pink/Green
description:
Adorable way for little girls to stay warm...and stylish, too! 

This listing is for a pink scarf with lime green bow.  

•Fits children ages 1 to 4

•Finished size is approximately  6" x 26"

Care instructions; hand wash in cool water; lay flat to dry.

Item will be shipped within 4 business days of receiving payment.
**Please make sure you double check the address you give me for shipping!

**I CAN NOT be held responsible for lost/stolen/delayed/damaged packages due to post office error/Holiday mail volume.

Refunds and Exchanges...

I want you to be 100% satisfied with your order, if for any reason you receive it and you are not happy, please do not hesitate to contact me and we will come up with a solution to the problem. You must contact me within 7 business days from the date that you receive your item.

Additional Policies and FAQs...

I love doing custom orders! Please feel free to message me and I will be happy to create a custom order for you! :)

name: Whimsical Victorian Caroling Mice Print
description:
Colorful and cute caroling mouse family to display during the holiday season or all year long!

Prints are available in 5x7 or 8x10 sizes.

Each print is...

• Printed on an Epson printer using Epson Premium paper products
• Printed with archival inks to last over 200 years!
• Packaged with care to avoid bending and damage during shipment.

Package mailed within 2 to 4 business days of receiving payment.

FREE SHIPPING UNTIL 11.30.13! USE THE CODE "FREESHIP2013" when you check out.

name: Snowman & Friends Merry Christmas Postcard (Digital File)
description:
Mr. Snowman and his furry and feathered friends wish everyone a MERRY CHRISTMAS!

NOTE: THIS LISTING IS FOR A DIGITAL FILE ONLY AND NOT FOR ACTUAL PRINTED MATERIALS.

Postcards are available in either a 4"x6" or 5"x7" size.

Envelopes are not included.

In 24 hours or less you will receive your proof in an email.  

Once you approve the proof, you will receive the final high resolution JPEG file via email. You can then take it to your favorite photo print place, such as Walmart, Walgreens, or your local printer for printing.  You can email it to family and friends, too!

All sales are final.

After the proof is approved and printable file is delivered, any new changes after the fact, or resizing of the item, will be done at an additional fee.

There are sometimes slight color differences between what the item looks like on your computer screen versus the printed output from your local photo lab.

ALL IMAGES ARE © DEBORAH C. JOHNSON 2013 and may not be copied, sold or redistributed.

name: Thank You So Beary Much • White Border
description:
Doesn't it make you feel extra special when someone takes the time to write and send a handwritten note? 

This sweet and expressive little bear will help brighten anyone's day!

Notecards have the following details:
• 6 cards/6 white (heavy stock) envelopes
• Size approx. 3.75 x 5"
• Printed on an Epson printer using Epson Premium paper products
• Printed with archival inks!
• Blank inside for your own personal note
• White Border, square corners
• Packaged in cellophane sleeve

Package mailed within 2 to 4 business days of receiving payment.

FREE SHIPPING UNTIL 11.30.13! USE THE CODE "FREESHIP2013" when you check out.
